p: The base maps provided from free shapefile maps which obtained from Iran Water Resource Management Company. The fuzzy algebraic product model was applied to combine the layers and determine land suitability for walnut cultivation. Here, the membership of an element in a set is defined with a value in the range of one (full membership) to zero (non-full membership). The degree of membership is usually expressed by a membership function whereby the form of the function can be linear, nonlinear, continuous or discontinuous. In a fuzzy model, each pixel in each map is assigned a value between zero and one which indicates the amount. The location of the pixel is inappropriate from the point of view of the relevant criterion for the target [ 28].
